con:config.con:query: SELECT LV1.Name,LV1.Value FROM [ExpenseReportingQa3].[dbo].[ExpenseReportHeader] E1 inner join [ExpenseReportingQa3].[dbo].[LineItem] L1 ON E1.Id=L1.ExpenseReportHeaderId inner join [ExpenseReportingQa3].[dbo].[LineItemValue] LV1 on L1.Id=LV1.LineItemId where E1.BuCode='AFU'

con:config.con:query: SELECT LV1.Name,LV1.Value FROM [ExpenseReportingQa3].[dbo].[ExpenseReportHeader] E1 inner join [ExpenseReportingQa3].[dbo].[LineItem] L1 ON E1.Id=L1.ExpenseReportHeaderId inner join [ExpenseReportingQa3].[dbo].[LineItemValue] LV1 on L1.Id=LV1.LineItemId where E1.BuCode='DEF'

con:config.con:query: SELECT LV1.Name,LV1.Value FROM [ExpenseReportingQa3].[dbo].[ExpenseReportHeader] E1 inner join [ExpenseReportingQa3].[dbo].[LineItem] L1 ON E1.Id=L1.ExpenseReportHeaderId inner join [ExpenseReportingQa3].[dbo].[LineItemValue] LV1 on L1.Id=LV1.LineItemId where E1.BuCode='XYZ'

con:config.con:query: SELECT LV1.Name,LV1.Value FROM [ExpenseReportingQa3].[dbo].[ExpenseReportHeader] E1 inner join [ExpenseReportingQa3].[dbo].[LineItem] L1 ON E1.Id=L1.ExpenseReportHeaderId inner join [ExpenseReportingQa3].[dbo].[LineItemValue] LV1 on L1.Id=LV1.LineItemId where E1.BuCode='DEF'
